Post.title: Git:
Post._content:
Git:( ### Git Git ### GitHub Github ![img][1] ### Git 1. git `#git rebase ` `#git rebase --continue` 2. gitcommit `#git log` commitncommit `#git rebase -i HEAD~n` `#git push -f origin chy/add-market` rebase `#git rebase --abort` 3. gitnew `#git rebase -i new-master` 4. git `#git merge ` `#git add .` `#git commit` 5. git (`#git log`) 06b3680 `#git reset --soft 06b3680` 06b3680 `#git reset --hard 06b3680` 6. git `#git fetch` `#git checkout -b local-branchname origin/remote_branchname` 7. git `#git fetch --all` `#git reset --hard origin/master` `#git pull` 8. git commit `git log -g` commit `git reset --hard d87da1f81de631fbe68c60c1e192aebce5a3cc72` 9. git `#git add -A` `#git commit -m "Your mark!"` master `#git pull origin master` master `#git push origin master` 10. git `#git remote set-url origin http://xxxxx.git` 11. git `#git stash ` `#git stash pop ` `#git stash drop ` ### Git 1. `error: RPC failed; result=22, HTTP code = 411` `fatal: The remote end hung up unexpectedly` `fatal: The remote end hung up unexpectedly` http buffergit git config http.postBuffer 67108864 2.push.ignore
.ignorepush git rm -r --cached .idea .ignoregit pushok sh.exe.stackdump sh.exe.stackdump 1. SourceTree 2. AndroidStudiosh.exe.stackdump 3. gitsh.exe.stackdump 2. `fatal: Unable to create '/.git/index.lock': File exists.` `$rm -f ./.git/index.lock` `In your repository directory.` ### Pro Git() [Pro Git()][2] [1]:/uploads/git-operation-probem/img_git_new_repository.jpg [2]:https://gitee.com/progit/index.html

Post.title: String
Post.raw:
---
title: String 
date: 2018-11-30 00:00:01
categories: android
tags: string
---

AndroidString
<!-- more -->

### 

<font size=4></font>   <font size=4></font> <font size=2></font>
```
CharSequence charSequence1 = "";
SpannableString spannableString = new SpannableString(charSequence1);
  spannableString.setSpan(new RelativeSizeSpan(0.5f), charSequence1.length() - 1,
  charSequence1.length(), Spanned.SPAN_EXCLUSIVE_EXCLUSIVE);
tvTitle.setText(spannableString);
```

### 

<font size=4></font>   <font size=4></font> <font size=4 color=#FFB72B></font>
```
CharSequence charSequence = "";
SpannableStringBuilder spannableStringBuilder = new SpannableStringBuilder(charSequence);
spannableStringBuilder.setSpan(
  new ForegroundColorSpan(getResources().getColor(R.color.gl_vip_up)),
  spannableStringBuilder.length() - 1, spannableStringBuilder.length(),
  Spanned.SPAN_EXCLUSIVE_EXCLUSIVE);
tvTitle.setText(spannableStringBuilder);
```
Post.content: AndroidString

Post.title: -JekyllHexo
Post._content: [Jekyll][0][Hexo][1]Markdown[Hexo][1][][2] (Windows)[Hexo][2] ### 1. GitNode.js * [Git][3] * [Node.js][4] 2. Hexo ``` $ npm install -g hexo-cli ``` ### ``` $ hexo init blackchy.github.io $ cd blackchy.github.io $ npm install ``` ### `_config.yml` ``` # Site title: Black Chy's Blog subtitle: description: Just a dog. keywords: Android, Developer, Dog author: Black Chy language: zh-CN timezone: Asia/Chongqing ``` ### landscape[hexo-theme-next][5] next ``` $ git clone https://github.com/theme-next/hexo-theme-next themes/next ``` `_config.yml``theme``next`next`tags``categories`index: ``` $ hexo new page tags $ hexo new page categories ``` ``` --- title: type: tags date: 2018-12-04 00:00:00 --- ``` ``` --- title: type: categories date: 2018-12-04 00:00:00 --- ``` next`_config.yml``theme->next->_config.yml`next 1. next4Gemini ``` scheme: Gemini ``` 2. ``` avatar: #url url: /uploads/avatar.png # rounded: true # 0-1 opacity: 1 # rotated: true ``` 3. ``` menu: home: / || home about: /about/ || user #tags: /tags/ || tags #categories: /categories/ || th archives: /archives/ || archive #schedule: /schedule/ || calendar #sitemap: /sitemap.xml || sitemap #commonweal: /404/ || heartbeat ``` 4. ``` busuanzi_count: enable: true total_visitors: true total_visitors_icon: user total_views: true total_views_icon: eye post_views: true post_views_icon: eye ``` 5. js ``` fastclick: true $ cd themes/next $ git clone https://github.com/theme-next/theme-next-fastclick source/lib/fastclick lazyload: true $ cd themes/next $ git clone https://github.com/theme-next/theme-next-jquery-lazyload source/lib/jquery_lazyload pace: true $ cd themes/next $ git clone https://github.com/theme-next/theme-next-pace source/lib/pace ``` ...... ### 1. ``` npm install hexo-generator-search npm install hexo-generator-searchdb ``` 2. hexo `_config.yml`: ``` search: path: search.xml field: post format: html limit: 10000 ``` 3. next `themes/next/_config.yml`: ``` local_search: enable: true trigger: auto top_n_per_article: 1 ``` [hexonext][6] ### Jekyll_postsHexosource/_posts`:year-:month-:day-:title.md`` _ ` ``` --- title: blog title date: YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss categories: misc tags: [tag1, tag2] --- ``` ```` ### (Git) ``` $hexo server hexo s ``` http://localhost:4000 Github 1. deploy,`_config.yml` ``` deploy: - type: git repo: git@github.com:blackchy/blackchy.github.io.git branch: [master] message: a commit message ``` 2. hexo-deployer-git ``` $ npm install hexo-deployer-git --save ``` 3. ``` $ hexo g -d ``` ### * JekyllgithubHexohexo * gitthemejs.git ---- [0]:https://jekyllrb.com/ [1]:https://github.com/hexojs/hexo [2]:https://hexo.io/zh-cn/docs/ [3]:https://git-scm.com/ [4]:https://nodejs.org/ [5]:https://github.com/theme-next/hexo-theme-next [6]:https://www.jianshu.com/p/5b62c01c4dfa
